Name: Windows 11 Dev Drive
Description: An official, lightweight Windows 11 environment for developers, provided by Microsoft.

Name: Ubuntu Server (LTS)
Description: The latest Long-Term Support version of Ubuntu Server.

Name: Debian
Description: The universal operating system, known for its stability and large software repositories.

Name: CentOS Stream
Description: A continuously delivered distro that’s a preview of what’s next in Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

Name: Fedora Server
Description: A powerful, flexible OS that includes the best and latest datacenter technologies.

Name: AlmaLinux
Description: A 1:1 binary compatible clone of RHEL®, guided and built by the community.
